per_frame_init_1=state_rot = 0;
per_frame_init_2=state_ori = 0;
per_frame_init_3=state_count = 0;
per_frame_init_4=state_shape = 0;
per_frame_init_5=state = 0;
per_frame_init_6=xs = 0;
per_frame_init_7=xy = 0;
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=basstime = basstime + (bass_att*0.09)*bass_att*0.25 + time*0.1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//state for rotation
per_frame_5=state_rot = state_rot + equal(bass_clip,2)*9.48;
per_frame_6=state_rot = if(above(state_rot,9.49),-4.74 , state_rot);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=rot = state_rot;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=//state for orientation
per_frame_11=state_ori = state_ori + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=//extra state rot and ori will not be linked
per_frame_14=state_ori = if(above(state_ori,4),0, state_ori);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=echo_orient = state_ori;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=//another state for shape tracking
per_frame_19=state = state + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_20=state = if(above(state,4), -1, state);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=//state_count 0 = sin 1 = cos
per_frame_23=state_count = state_count + equal(state,-1);
per_frame_24=state_count = if(above(state_count,1), 0 , state_count);
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=//state for shapes
per_frame_27=state_shape = state_shape + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_28=state_shape = if(equal(state_shape,7),98 , state_shape);
per_frame_29=state_shape = if(above(state_shape,98), 0 , state_shappe);
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=//reset state
per_frame_32=state = state + equal(state,-1);
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=//add bouns on beat
per_frame_35=xs = xs + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_36=ys = ys + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=speed = 0.08;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=//state 0 elipse
per_frame_41=xs = xs + (equal(0,state))*atan(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_42=ys = ys + (equal(0,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=//state 1 diag
per_frame_45=xs = xs + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_46=ys = ys + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_47=
per_frame_48=//state 2 -circle
per_frame_49=xs = xs + (equal(2,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_50=ys = ys + (equal(2,state))*sin(bass_time*4)*speed;
per_frame_51=
per_frame_52=//state 3 parametric arc
per_frame_53=xs = xs + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*5)*speed;
per_frame_54=ys = ys + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*9)*speed;
per_frame_55=
per_frame_56=//state 4 arc
per_frame_57=xs = xs + (equal(4,state))*atan(bass_time*6)*speed;
per_frame_58=ys = ys + (equal(4,state))*cos(bass_time*2)*speed;
per_frame_59=
per_frame_60=//project and publish
per_frame_61=q1 = 0.5 + equal(state_count,0)*0.45*sin(xs) + equal(state_count,1)*0.45*sin(xs*1.1);
per_frame_62=q2 = 0.5 + equal(state_count,0)*0.45*sin(ys) + equal(state_count,1)*0.45*cos(ys);
per_frame_63=q3 = state_shape;
per_pixel_1=zoom = 0.95;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=dx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x*rad;
per_pixel_5=dy = 1 + (q2- 0.5)*0.1*y*rad;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=sx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x;
per_pixel_8=sy = 1 + (q2-0.5)*0.1*x;
per_pixel_9=
